title: Continuing Eligibility
content:
Continuing Eligibility

§ 351.20 - Determination of continuing eligibility
§ 351.21 - Required contacts and investigation
§ 351.22 - Action to be taken upon failure to appear at face-to-face interviews or failure to participate in an interview by telephone or other digital means, or upon determination of ineligibility or of change in degree of need
§ 351.23 - Notification of change in grant
§ 351.24 - [Repealed]

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
